1.content: What is your place in the world of My Hero Academia?
1.title: The Choice

choices: Your father parked, he was a teacher at the school.
11.content:
You had done it, against all odds you made it into UA. Your dream was to become a stealth hero, you wanted to put your quirk to good use and become a worldwide sensation rather than being barely noticeable. You were nervous, going to a school full of students with powerful quirks was intimidating... add on the fact that they were all gigantic compared to you and it made things even worse. Your father, a pro hero himself, placed you onto his shoulder and got into the car, ready to take you to your first day at UA.

"So, are you excited?" Your father asked.

"I guess... I'm mostly nervous." You sighed.

"Don't worry about what the other students think of you, you're gonna do fine." Your father patted you on the head with a giant finger.

Pulling into the school...
11.title: The Tiny Hero in training

111.content: Who was your pro hero father?
111.title: Your father parked, he was a teacher at the sch...

choices: Deciding to go in without your dad
1111.content:
All Might flashed his famous smile as he scooped you into his palm, fitting like a pea on the rough and warm skin. "Keep your chin up my boy! I've seen your training and determination, a future of heroism is in sights."

You smiled at your father's words. He always help you with training and encouraged you, rather it be giving a massive hug with you between his pecs or allowing you to climb him like a mountain.

Of course while caring All Might could be oblivious at times, you lost track of all the times you ended up beneath him. Having such a titan father meant ending up under his foot was probably your destination for the day, as your tiny body was barely noticable.

All Might soon began to make his way into the school holding you at the level of his buff chest as he loomed over. The blond hero's muscular form was hugged tightly by his white button up and yellow suit.

Soon you and your father arrived before the door to class, you were suddenly set down before All Might's brown shoes. Looking up you couldn't see the giant blond's face past his huge pecs but you heard his booming chuckle.

"Alright little one, i need to go dress in my hero costume but I'll return shortly!", All Might flashed a thumbs up as he began walking away, making the ground shake beneath him.

You smiled and hummed before.....
1111.title: Mighty Dad

1112.content:
Aizawa got out of his car, you held onto his long hair to steady yourself on the shoulder. It was a long way down past your father's muscular body kept under his baggy outfit to the black boots you sometimes ended up under.

You had been uncertain about your high school choices, you desired to be a hero but still nervousness about your quirk hindered you. Aizawa had helped you train in areas such as fitness and stealth, both of which had you outrunning his feet or climbing him. You passed the written exam and it was decided you would get a week to test out if you could make it in the class.

You were soon scooped into your dad's palm as he had a small smile on his scruffy face. "You lost in your thoughts again squirt?"

Shaking your head you grinned. "Heh sorry, I'm ready to be a hero dad. I'll knock the socks off my classmates!"

Aizawa looked amused and snorted before lowering his capture weapon and pulling down his collor. Your father's firm and slightly hair pecs showed as he flexed them and brought you below his chin.

"Don't get cocky, I'm not going easy on you kid. Your gonna get use to dodging feet while your here.", Aizawa smirked as he tilted his palm.

"Dad I'm use to your fee-WHOA!", you trailed off as you fell towards the large chest.

You soon slid right between Aizawa's pecs, walls of warm and firm muscles were already squishy you. A b.o smell was flowing through the muscles as sweaty fumes were emitted from your giant dad.

Aizawa smugly grinned as he pulled up his collor, bouncing his pecs to feel your tiny body. "I told you taking a shower wasn't a smart idea. Not only does it waste time but it's all for nothing if your going to smell like sweat."

The teacher began walking to class, bouncing his pecs to squeeze you with his sweaty and tough pecs.

Soon....
1112.title: Eraser Dad

choices: He decides to tuck you away for now
He walks in calmly, you in his hand
11121.content:
With a confident smirk plastered on the scruffy face of the normally dreary teacher, he moved towards his classroom passing bay the teacher's offices to see a few of them wandering about in there. Curious, the hero peeked in, "What's going on here?"

It was Lady Midnight who turned to the black-clad professor. "Oh great! We were just about to come look for you. We were just about to have a quick meeting about your son and the stuff and stuff about him."

Snipe nodded, leaning against the wall with a relaxed aura surrounding him, "Yeah, he's not gonna be out on the battlefield and the likes, but he'd be excellent for recon and undercover stuff. While he may be in 1A, Nezu reckons that we should give the lil' guy a different curriculum; which you already know."

"I just wanted to be sure that everyone was aware." Principal Nezu's voice seemed to appear from nowhere as the small mammal wandered in.

You were astounded by this yourself. While you still attempted to do your best in fighting the slides of sweat oozing from your father's chest, you were rather embarrassed yet still grateful that the teachers had a lot of care for you.

"Where is the little man, anyway?" Present Mic piped in, a wide grin on his face. Aizawa shook his head, already annoyed by the other hero's presence in the room.

"He's in the car. I was just... Going to the toilet before taking him in. I can't leave him alone in public and there's no way I would take him with me to the bathroom." The shady teacher stated with an awkward chuckle, though the lie was mostly unnoticed by the rest of the staff.

With the meeting adjourned, Aizawa decided to check up on you while moving down the hall. As the fingers reached down, you grabbed them quickly and hauled yourself out of the sweaty region. "You right there, squirt?" He teased.

You huffed in annoyance, your clothes and skin coated in a light layer of sweat and B.O. "That was gross dad." You complained, looking away from him.

"Keep up the bratty attitude and you know where you end up." The father warned with a stern look as he approached the class. You gulped lightly, your eyes momentarily flicking down towards the thick, airtight boots that your father wore so frequently.

"Sorry..." You said quietly, Aizawa nodded. Now should he get you to meet all your classmates on the first day... Or should he wait till things are more settled with your schedule and such...
11121.title: Quick Team Meeting

112.content:
"I'll be sure to pick you up when you call son." Your dad told you as you nodded in understanding, "Right dad, see ya around." You said to him as he nodded with a lighthearted smile and drove off away from the drop off point, leaving you to marvel at the massive size of the school it itself, whether or not you were small or not, it was still a great sight.

With that in mind you started to walk into the school, taking heed to avoid the wandering footsteps of students that couldn't see you reliably or absentmindedly, but it was quite fortunate that your quirk allows for your body to be more durable than it should be at your size.

"Now what room am I in? Class 1-A?" You asked yourself looking at a properly scaled map of the school in your hand, your focus on not getting lost blinded you to bumping into the shoes of someone, as you stumbled back from the sudden impediment, "Huh?" You look up to the sight of an unaware...
112.title: You were dropped off.

choices: Bakugo Noticed You in Izuku's Hand and Made fun of Your Size.
Izuku Put You Down At Your Desk And You Met the Other Students.
1121.content:
You looked up to see a guy that looked to be the same age as you, his fluffy green hair was unkempt and you could tell just by looking at him that he had a muscular physique.

"Hi!" You shouted up, causing him to turn around with a confused look on his face.

"Huh? Who said that?"

"Down here!" You yelled.

He looked down at you and was surprised to see you standing at an inch tall.

"Oh, hey there, are you a new student too?" He asked as he bent down to get a better look at you.

"Yeah, what's your name?" You stepped back a bit, a stranger being this close to you made you a bit uneasy.

"I'm Izuku Midoriya, nice to meet you!" He extended his ring finger for a 'handshake'.

You put your hand on his finger and told him your name.

"What class are you in?" You asked.

"Class 1-A, what about you?"

"Me too, I'm just having trouble figuring out where to go.. it's a little hard for me to make my way around." You chuckled.

"I'll help you out, climb on." Izuku opened his palm, you stepped onto it and the two of you entered the school.

After a bit of walking around, Izuku found the door to the room and you both entered.
1121.title: Izuku

choices: Seeing as there was time, you asked him to elaborate.
Before you could ask, Class begins.
11212.content:
You looked about in amazement of the other classmates in the room from your vantage point on the desk that Izuku had helpfully placed you on.

"Man this is so cool." You whispered to yourself, your dream of getting into a Hero Course has just begun, you couldn't wait to see what this class had to offer.

You look around to take stock of your fellow classmates, some were 'average' like Izuku or that one with the blond hair looking like he's brooding, and some were a bit weird, was that girl pink and have antennae? And that guy looked like a edgy bird of sorts.

"Heh, its a lot to take in right?" A voice asked you suddenly making you jump a bit as you turn around to see another guy with blond hair but with a black streak at certain parts.

"God don't scare me like that!" You yelled comically as he chuckled apologetically and replied to you, "Sorry about that, couldn't help but notice Izuku carrying a new student, my name is Denki Kaminari, and you are?" He introduced himself, you suppose you should do the same.

You gave him your name as he accepted it with a nod, "Interesting name, well I hope you have a good time here, weird things seem to follow 1-A at times." He said chuckling a bit as you were confused, what kind of weird things?
11212.title: Izuku Put You Down At Your Desk And You Met the...

choices: Bakugo did something embarrassing to you.
Bakugo threw you back onto your desk and walked away.
112121.content:
"Like what...?" You asked.

"Oh I dunno... like villains attacking and stuff." Denki explained "You better watch out too, wouldn't wanna end up under a foot" He joked.

"Heh, that would be bad for me..." You played it off cool.

The truth was you were always attracted to giant men, getting squished or ending up in humiliating situations.

"What the hell are you?"

You turned to see a giant, sneering face. The spiky haired blond looked like he was ready to crush you.

"A human... just a small one." You chuckled.

The giant student snatched you up in a tight fist.

"Psh, yeah right, you're a BUG!" He laughed as he squeezed you in his warm palm.

"C'mon Bakugo, don't be a douche to the new guy." Denki sighed.

"Yeah, just put him down!" Deku frowned.
112121.title: Schooled

choices: Bakugou let's out a small explosion
1121211.content:
Bakugou grunted before smirking. "Fine I will!"

However, rather then putting you back on Izuku's desk the ash-blond dumped you onto his seat. Your body landed in the center with an "Oof!"

Just as you adjusted to the sudden change, the sky darkening made you look up in surprise as it was filled by a large butt stretching the dark blue pants of the uniform. The bootyiful sky came closer and soon you were covered in darkness and a heavy weight.

Bakugou's smirk turned toothy as he felt your tiny body get smothered beneath his cheek. Izuku's eyes widened as he watched you vanish beneath his childhood friend's butt.

"K-kachaan what are yo-!"

"Can it Deku, I'm just showing the bug his place!"

Bakugou started swaying side to side, mashing you up under his large cheeks. He gained a shit eating grin as he felt you get sucked from beneath his cheek to his crack before feeling his glutes relax on their new "cushion".

"Isn't that a little extreme Bakugou?", Denki said awkwardly rubbing his head. He'd seen pics of Bakugou in jeans and he wouldn't deny that the explosive teen had a big butt. Kami knows if this was a good way to use it.

Bakugou tched before throwing his feet on the desk. "Whatever, heck I'm sure the little basterd's enjoying it!"

He wasn't wrong actually. While you were shocked at the cheeks squishing you and unsuccessfully trying to duck you into the musky crack of the giant, you found enjoyment. Bakugou's butt was firm and round with just enough fat to make it perfect.

The heavy cheeks smooshing you was one of the best yet. All the times you've been sat on before the butt was too firm and was like rock, bubble butts were too jiggly and smothered you to much.

Bakugou chuckled as he felt your body cuddling up to his cheeks. "Ha, told ya!"

What was next?
1121211.title: Taking A Seat

choices: Skip to the end of training.
1121212.content:
Bakugo rolled his eyes and tossed you back onto your desk.

"Whatever, wouldn't wanna be you shrimpy, I'll squash you like the bug you are before the year's over with." Bakugo grinned evilly.

"Are you okay?" Deku asked.

"Yeah, I'm fine." You said, the truth was, you wished that Bakugo would do something to you.

Aizawa walked into the classroom and didn't bother to introduce you to the rest of the class, you thought that he probably forgot about you. Some time passed and class was dismissed before the training began.

"Hey, what am I supposed to do?" You asked Aizawa.

Aizawa shrugged "I guess you can't really participate with the other students in training. I'll just keep an eye on you." He reached down and scooped you up in his massive hand.

Where did Aizawa put you?
1121212.title: Bakugo threw you back onto your desk and walked...

11212122.content:
"Since you can't participate in normal training, I'll just have to come up with something different for you." Aizawa said.

"Like what?" You were intrigued.

"Endurance training. Since you're so small, you'll need to learn how to deal with regular human villains." He explained "So I'll keep you tucked away somewhere and see how you hold up."

Your eyes widened with glee, Aizawa was going to stuff you somewhere on his body, this should be fun.

"Okay, where will I be then?" You asked, eager to find out.
11212122.title: Somewhere else

choices: Follow the training session from within Aizawa's armpit
Skip to the end of training
112121222.content:
When all of the students left to change into their hero outfits, Aizawa looked down at you with a smirk. He slipped his black shirt off, causing you to blush as his bare torso loomed above you.

"My armpit." Aizawa finally answered your question as he rose his free arm up, revealing his hairy pit to you.

"I can take it, no problem!" You said proudly, you were actually really excited to be pressed into the handsome giant's armpit, but you passed it off as confidence.

"Pretty cocky for someone your size, I'll try not to sweat too much. Last chance to back out and go home."

You simply shook your head, "Trust me, I can handle it."

Aizawa lifted you up and pressed you against the soft, hairy, damp flesh under his arm. He squished you deep into the pit and rubbed you in before lowering his arm, smushing you tight between his arm and armpit before putting his shirt back on.

"Don't say I didn't warn you." Aizawa grinned and squeezed his arms to his sides.

Your small body was compressed inside of his armpit, causing you to let out a small, barely audible moan from within the smelly pocket of flesh.
112121222.title: In his armpit

112122.content:
Before you could ask for elaboration you heard the bell ring and looked towards the front of the class, Denki returning to his seat, but not without you looking at his ass and wondering how it would feel to be under it. You were gay, although you made sure to hide that fact because you were incredibly embarrassed about it.

It was the one good thing about your power. You were nigh invincible while shrunk which meant you could be crushed by the best asses and dicks in town without any trouble, it didn't even hurt, being crushed and all. You had also grown attached to the smell of sweat, farts, etc, so basically, you liked to be around guys when they didn't know you were there so you could experience their manly smells. One time, you had snuck into a guy's underwear in the washroom and he sat on you and farted on you without even knowing it; it was a memory you'll never forget.

You saw the famed Eraser-Head walk in, known for his ability to cancel quirks (Which could be devastating for you if he activated his power while you were nearby). He went on to introduce himself and started talking about a test for the hero hopefuls (It's the start of the series). Everyone walked outside but you spoke up to Eraser-Head when you were alone, showing him that you obviously couldn't do any tests, so he exempts you from it.

What did he do then though?

A: Take you with him to the practice to watch your future comrades
B: Let's you walk around the school (And Perv on people unaware)
C: Deku remembers about you and comes back in to pick you up, and he carries you somewhere embarrassing because his superhero outfit didn't have any pockets (I'm sorry if I'm messing up any ordering, haven't watched the series in forever.
112122.title: Interruption with a confession.

1121222.content:
"Well, since you can't participate I guess you can do whatever you want in the meantime. Don't get into any trouble... or else." Aizawa gave you a serious look.

"Of course I won't! What kind of trouble could I cause at my size?" You said with a sly look, before Aizawa snatched you up in his hand abruptly.

"Don't do anything stupid." His cold, scruffy face cause you to stiffen up.

"Got it..." You said before Aizawa put you back on the floor.

Aizawa walked out of the room, leaving you alone to do whatever you wanted to... you went out into the empty hallway and watched as your teacher walked away, you had to admit he was pretty hot. Suddenly, you felt quakes as someone approached you from behind....

It couldn't be someone from Class 1-A.... who was it then?
1121222.title: Free Time.

12.content:
You were called many things. Villian, fiend, opposer of society, and even bug.

But that didn't change your position that you've taken in this big wide world of quirks. That being a member of the League of Villians. Determined to change the world and get rid of All Might.

Your life had once only conceived of looking through garbage for scarps and dodging the shoes of giants that didn't even look down at the your inch tall form on the sidewalk. Since you were little you grew up on the street, probably abandoned since your quirk was seen as useless.

Heroes were a bitter topic since you never could be saved because they couldn't even see you. A lot of of fights happen in alleyways and everytime a hero broke it up, you tried to get thier attention. They either didn't see you, or even in some cases tried stepping on you.

This life of brooding and hatred was given light when you were noticed one day, when you were about twenty. A figure made out of mist in a suit had actually spotted your inch form huddled up against a wall. He soon offered you a misty hand to climb on and asked you.

"What do you think of heroes?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Your new life then began.

A new home awaited at a bar, with plenty of alcohol and warmth. The misty was known as Kuroguri, and he introduced you to the figure called All For One and Sensei. He offered you a spot in the league, and you accepted right there.

Your quirk was finally given a purpose. It turns out that from living on the street your good at climbing and sneaking. Your position in the League of Villians was that of a information gatherer, using your size to sneak into agency's and gather not so well received info and releasing it to the villians and public. You had ruined the career of ten heroes by recording thier records of illegal deals. It was frustrating for them because you were never caught and they couldn't figure out what kind of quirk you had.

You enjoyed relaxing at the bar. Kuroguri usually gave you free drinks, though he only had to use a full cup that was like a bath to you.

Shigaraki was somewhat accepting of your residency. He often treated you as a pet, carrying you with special gloves and making you watch him play video games. But you didn't mind it much.

All For One was someone you admired and felt intimidated by. A figure so powerful that you felt even smaller. You hadn't seen him, but he must be the biggest giant ever.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Today was a eventful day as.......
12.title: Villain

13.content:
You considered yourself normal, despite your obvious differences. The quirk you were born with made you only an inch in height and this didn't really inspire any drive to become a hero. Instead of trying to get into a hero school, you choose to instead go to a normal high school and had to put up with years of being stomped and sat on by your classmates either because they barely noticed you or just enjoyed treating you like a bug.

After school you managed to get a job working at home as a telemarketer and actually could move out of your overbearing parents home. You had a roommate by the name of Uzumo, a man the complete opposite of you by being a 6'5 tan bara of a man with short blond hair. He took his role as roommate seriously and tried protecting you at all costs usually by putting you between his muscles. In the apartment over you had a neighbor that was said to be a pro hero, and you plan to visit them when Uzumo was out.

On a Saturday Uzumo headed out to work and you managed to slip under the door and make it to the door next over. Just as you were about to try and pound the towering door, it opened and pulled inward. A large shadow fell over you and you gasped as you saw the person in question.

Who was it?
13.title: Normal citizen

choices: He picked you up to see what you were.
He thought you were a bug!
131.content:
You looked up to see the gigantic, muscular form of All Might himself! You couldn't see anything past his buff pecs.

"All Might! I'm down here! I'm your biggest fan!" You tried to get his attention, but he didn't seem to hear you.

"Hmm? I could have sworn a heard a faint knocking sound..." All Might looked around before looking to the ground.

"Hey! It was me!" You shouted.

All Might gave a confused look as he heard your squeaky voice...
131.title: All Might

choices: "Can you tell me about being a hero?"
1311.content:
All Might looked over his large pecs at the ground in confusion. The only thing that caught his attention on the ground was the speck in front of his feet, seemingly the source of the squeaks. Curious, the giant hero bend down crunching his abs as he reached for you.

You watched in awe and fear as the titanic hero's face looked at you from above his strong chest. Your adrenaline peaked as you saw All Might's face being covered by his approaching palm. Using his finger and thumb, All Might picked you up like a speck between his large appendages. The wind blasted you as you were greeted with the view of the No.1 hero's buff muscles squeezing the white shirt he wore.

Finally you were brought to All Might's face and gulped as his striking blue eyes locked onto your puny body between his thumb and finger. After looking at you for a little, the giant grew his signature grin and laughed.

"Ah hello there citizen! Forgive me I didn't see you at first.", All Might's hearty voice boomed bit wasn't loud enough that it hurt. He then gently placed you in his left palm where you fit like a pea in the warm rough hand.

"It's ok I just wanted to come over and say that I moved in next door and I'm a huge fan!", you exclaimed as excitement dissolved your previous fear.

All Might let out another warm laugh and lightly bounced his large pecs. "Ah thank you, it's always great to meet a fan! Now then, allow me to give you a warm welcome!"

Turning around, All Might closed his door and entered while holding you lower to his chest. As the blond hero walked, you admired the large pecs stretching the shirt collar and the thick neck with a firm jaw you had trouble seeing past.

Walking into his living room, All Might took a seat at the couch and heard it creak under his large body mass. He then brought you up to his face still bright with that smile.

"All Might, thank you this....but I don't want to take up your free time.", you nervously said fiddling with your fingers.

All Might however let out a deep chuckle and used his colossal finger to rub your head. "Now none of that! I want to welcome you as my new neighbor, so tell me what can I do to make you feel welcome?"

"Well All Might....
1311.title: Meeting Your Mighty Neighbor

choices: You are related to a hero
You are related to a hero in training
You are related to a villian
You have a job using your size
14.content: What is the role you play in this hero world?
14.title: More Choices

141.content: Who's it going to be?
141.title: You are related to a hero

1411.content:
Your dad was the No.1 hero and symbol of peace himself, All Might. You were actually his adopted child as your parents had been close friends with him and died when you were little.

All Might took care of you and tried to give you a happy life. However, it proved difficult as you inherited your mother's quirk of being a inch tall enforced with your father's quirk of high durability. The durability came in handy as All Might while protective, did get in some odd situations with you. Being so tiny to a giant came with ending up under his feet, butt, and muscles. All Might couldn't find you one time and only did when his colleague Eraserhead took notice of the tiny arm sticking out of his spandex butt crack.

Due to the numerous cases of being squished, All Might opted to keep you in between his beefy pecs for safe keeping most of the time. You didn't mind as the blond hero's pecs were like a warm canyon and you actually liked walking on the floor despite the danger as you loved to see your father towering over you. You slept in bed with All Might, usually nuzzled up in his pecs.

Where are you now?
1411.title: All Might

14111.content:
You sat on All Might's pecs, watching TV as your giant adoptive father lounged back on the couch. You soon heard the giant, muscular hero begin to snore, his giant mouth wide opened behind you.

You stood up on the giant chest as All Might's tight, white T-shirt could barely contain his muscles.

You were about to climb down to turn the volume up on the remote, when you began to slip off of the gigantic pecs.

Where did you end up?
14111.title: At home with All Might

141112.content:
You fell off of All Might's pecs and landed face first onto his giant armpit, which was thankfully covered by his thin t-shirt. The fabric of the shirt was damp and the giant hero's stench invaded your nostrils as you gagged.

"Ugh, looks like someone forgot to wear deodorant today..." You whispered as you were about to make your way down onto the couch.

Suddenly, All Might's snoring stopped, and he began to bring his arm to his side.

"Wait! I'm in here!" You shouted, but All Might didn't hear you in time and you were squished in between his damp pit.

"Hm?" All Might looked around for you, checking the bottoms of his bare feet and standing up to check to see if he somehow sat on you.

Minutes passed before...
141112.title: Mighty Armpit

142.title: You are related to a hero in training

choices: You were at school with your brother
1422.content:
There's often the problem of your younger sibling being mistaken as the older. Mostly because the younger one was taller. The same could be said with you but in a much BIGGER scale.

You were the first child Bakugou child born, but strangely was given the quirk of being a inch tall. It was a struggle growing up small and even more when your brother Katsuki was born.

You were in junior school when he was in grade school, and like all kids Katsuki liked to play. Heroes and villians was a constant, and you always played the villain crushed by the hero.

After you finished high school, your brother was preparing to try and get into U.A high school. You were happy he was pursuing his dreams but he often asked for your help.

This included getting stuffed between his pecs, biceps, and abs when he worked out. Getting shoved against his warm sweaty muscle was a constant. Also he used you as a cushion, both stepping on you and sitting his big butt on you for hours.

Katsuki did care for you as a brother, but also held firm to showing how he treats bugs.

Right now...
1422.title: Katsuki Bakugo

14231.content:
The Iida family was known for their line of heroes and speed. The only similarity you had was the name, as your quirk was far different as you were neither fast or as tall.

Strangely your quirk was being only a inch in height. This didn't affect the love your family had for you but it did lead to complications such as being stepped on or squished beneath a body.

Your older brothers Tenya and Tensei took the role of big brothers seriously as siblings naturally do. Tenya did look after you more as Tensei got busy with work.

Tenya usually carried you around mostly in between his pecs and kept you there for hours sometimes. There were awkward situations such as when he accidentally sits on you or finds you stuck to his sole. He was always remorseful so you were never upset.

Still it was frustrating how protective Tenya could be. He wanted to keep you safe so he always told you not to be a hero and rely on him.

Where were you now?
14231.title: Tenya Iida

choices: Hovered his huge foot over you
Placed his feet next to you and looked down
142311.content:
Right now you were laying on the miles and miles of the bed fit for giants. Seeing as you were only an inch tall you never really had a room of your own, staying in your parents and brother's room as you got older. You've spent the last few years staying in Tenya's room, you'd usually be napping or reading his books if he ever left you here.

Speaking of, your big brother has been gone for a while and you really weren't feeling like taking a nap. Walking over to the high ledge, you grabbed the blanket and began slid down to the ground far below.

You soon landed and now had the furniture looming over as usual. Iida's desk with his books, his pairs of running shoes, and muscle shirts all surrounded the huge room. Now what should you do? Maybe climb up and see what he's been reading, or try and get to the kitchen to eat...

The ground suddenly began to have slight shakes, the sound of footsteps approached the door before it opened up. Iida walked in his large bare feet stomping the ground. He wore a pair of dark blue sweatpants, his large muscular torso uncovered and showing his strength as sweat dripped from his huge pecs.

Iida wiped sweat from his forehead, just getting back from a workout. He did wish you had been with him, but he figured you need a rest. "I'm back otouto, I'm sorry for taking so long!"

You ran to the center of the room. "I'm right here big brother!", you called up to your towering bluenette sibling.

Iida began walking into the room, his feet making the ground shake like tremors. His muscular body soon loomed over you and his glasses face was blocked by his pecs. He then...
142311.title: At home

choices: You found yourself caught in the fibers of the rag
He picks up the rag and sees you on the floor
He picks up the rag but does not see you on the floor
1423113.content:
Your eyes widened as the large, expansive sole of your brother hovered above you. Flinching, your eyes squeezed shut at the thought of the inevitable; only for the dense shadow to reveal to light once more as the foot passed over your body. You let out a sigh of relief and turn to try and get the attention of the Iida once more.

The giant's eyes scanned around him once again, as he diligently searched for his minuscule brother. He sighed and opened a drawer, pulling out a neatly-folded, clean sweat rag. Beginning to wipe the sweat from his dense abs, Tenya began to feel concerned, turning himself around to look behind his massive form.

Upon his lack of concentration, he dropped the fabric, the rag falling to the floor right towards you. You attempted to run would the way, but was caught under the thick, heavy blanket of lightly, sweat-dampened fabric. It was lightly used, but still held a musky scent that was noticeable.

The older sibling sighed, bending down to pick the cloth up...
1423113.title: Walked over you, unaware

144.content:
They say that a quirk represents who a person is, and you would have to agree. People had joked before that if they had your quirk they'd panic at having to live at an inch tall. You however learned not only to live at this size but also appreciate it.

You once worked at an office which was hell as it is, but it was extra tough as you had to run around a keyboard to type. Many of the higher employees made fun of you, they had thier own rooms and suits while you worked in a row of five others and wore wrinkled clothes. They would step on you and even sit on you while insulting you.

"Uh, don't dirty my shoes bug!"

"Well you're awful at work but you do make a nice seat cushion."

"Take it this way, I'm just stomping out competition!"

It was strange, but being treated like a bug actually excited you and you enjoyed being degraded for your size! You figured that rather then just well groomed businessmen, you could be a bug to many others. So you quit and gave a goodbye, only to be answered with a loafer's sole. You wouldn't have it any other way.

The service Tiny Help was founded and advertised as a way for men to relax or let out thier frustration. You offered spa services like foot rubs and body worship for 3,500 ¥. There was also domination for 5,500¥, customers could sit on you, stomp you, crush you under thier dicks, etc.

Your business become popular as it was a way for men to enjoy the feeling of being big and relieving any stress. Heroes and citizens all made appointments.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You sat at the front desk of your store, the door at the back led to a room with furniture so the customer could relax if he chooses so. The bell on the door rung as it opened and you looked up to your next client.

Who was it?
144.title: You have a job using your size

1441.content:
A man walked into the store and you automatically recognized him.

"Whoa... is that who I think it is? He's never come here before..." You thought.

Who was the giant hero?
1441.title: A Hero

choices: Seeing how much weight you can take
14411.content:
Entering your building was the number one hero himself All Might! The giant man had to duck his head to get in before looking around. "Hello is anyone here?", his booming voice echoed.

"Yes over here I'm the owner!", you yelled as loud as possible hoping the blond giant would here you. It seems you were lucky as All Might turned to the desk you were on his already present smile grew as he began walking over, making your ground shake with each step.

As All Might stopped before the desk you looked up in awe. Rather then his hero outfit, the buff blond was wearing a tight pair of green trousers and a white short that looked painted on. The abs pushed against the shirt and you couldn't even see his face as it was blocked by his huge pecs.

The giant looked down over his pecs at you, laughing as he put his hands on his hips. "Why hello there citizen! Apologies for the sudden appearance but your services were recommended by a colleague."

You shook your head and smiled. "No it's alright i appreciate you considering Tiny help!", this was great, other heros were recommending you! You had given services to the hero Eraserhead and he certainly enjoyed them.

All Might reached down and enclosed you in a fist, the huge warm hand covered your body safe for your head. You were brought up the bulky torso before the striking eyes of the hero.

"Of course I've great things about you, also you are quite adorable as well.", the hero beamed getting you to blush as you saw him bounce his buff pecs.

"T-thank you Mr.All Might, so...if you head to the back then we can get started.", you blushed at the compliment as the warm and soft palm hugged you.

All Might nodded and began waking to the back keeping you leveled with his strong chest. Arriving in the backroom, All Might sat his firm butt on the couch getting it to creak from his weight. Unclenching his fist had you sitting in the palm about the size of a pea.

"So what are you interested in Mr.All Might?"

The buff blond hummed before deciding on......
14411.title: All Might

info.brief_description: In a world full of giant heroes, you stand at one inch tall!
info.description:
In a world with so many amazing superpowers, you got the short end of the stick and got one of the lamest quirks, appropriately named, "Tiny." This quirk made you only an inch tall at all times, but even the worst quirks can have their upsides

Choose your profession, are you a normal citizen, are you a tiny hero in training at UA, are you a villain? No matter what, I'm sure that you'll be surrounded by the giant guys of the hero world.

Rules

1: Only male interactions.

2: Always refer to the reader as you, your, you're etc.

3: All fetishes are allowed except for scat.

4: No extremely short chapters unless it's a choice chapter.

And that's pretty much it, have fun.
info.pretty_title: The Giants of My Hero Academia
